always <S%G3842><s%> in my prayers <S%G4335><s%> making <S%G1189><s%> request, <S%G1189><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> perhaps <S%G4458><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at last <S%G4218><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> I may succeed <S%G2137><s%> in coming <S%G2064><s%> to you.

that is, that I may be encouraged <S%G4837><s%> together <S%G4837><s%> with you [while] among <S%G1722><s%> you, each <S%G240><s%> of us by the other's faith, <S%G4102><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> yours <S%G4771><s%> and mine. <S%G1473><s%>

And I do not want <S%G2309><s%> you to be unaware, <S%G50><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> that often <S%G4178><s%> I have planned <S%G4388><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you (and have been prevented <S%G2967><s%> thus <S%G891><s%> far <S%G891><s%>) in order <S%G2443><s%> that I might obtain <S%G2192><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you also, <S%G2532><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as among <S%G1722><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> under <S%G3781><s%> obligation <S%G3781><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to Greeks <S%G1672><s%> and to barbarians, <S%G915><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to the wise <S%G4680><s%> and to the foolish. <S%G453><s%>

For I am <S%G1870><s%> not ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> for it is the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for salvation <S%G4991><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who believes, <S%G4100><s%> to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> and also <S%G5037><s%> to the Greek. <S%G1672><s%>

because <S%G1360><s%> that which <S%G1110><s%> is known <S%G1110><s%> about God <S%G2316><s%> is evident <S%G5318><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> them; for God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G5319><s%> it evident <S%G5319><s%> to them.

For since <S%G575><s%> the creation <S%G2937><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> His invisible <S%G517><s%> attributes, His eternal <S%G126><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and divine <S%G2305><s%> nature, <S%G2305><s%> have been clearly <S%G2529><s%> seen, <S%G2529><s%> being understood <S%G3539><s%> through what <S%G4161><s%> has <S%G4161><s%> been <S%G4161><s%> made, <S%G4161><s%> so <S%G1519><s%> that they are without <S%G379><s%> excuse. <S%G379><s%>

For even though they knew <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> they did not honor <S%G1392><s%> Him as God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> give <S%G2168><s%> thanks; <S%G2168><s%> but they became <S%G3154><s%> futile <S%G3154><s%> in their speculations, <S%G1261><s%> and their foolish <S%G801><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> was darkened. <S%G4654><s%>
Professing <S%G5335><s%> to be wise, <S%G4680><s%> they became <S%G3471><s%> fools, <S%G3471><s%>

and exchanged <S%G236><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the incorruptible <S%G862><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for an image <S%G1504><s%> in the form <S%G3667><s%> of corruptible <S%G5349><s%> man <S%G444><s%> and of birds <S%G4071><s%> and four-footed animals <S%G5074><s%> and crawling <S%G2062><s%> creatures. <S%G2062><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them over <S%G3860><s%> in the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of their hearts <S%G2588><s%> to impurity, <S%G167><s%> that their bodies <S%G4983><s%> might be dishonored <S%G818><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them.

For they exchanged <S%G3337><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for a lie, <S%G5579><s%> and worshiped <S%G4573><s%> and served <S%G3000><s%> the creature <S%G2937><s%> rather <S%G3844><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the Creator, <S%G2936><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is blessed <S%G2128><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

And just <S%G2531><s%> as they did not see <S%G1381><s%> fit <S%G1381><s%> to acknowledge <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1922><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> any longer, God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> them over <S%G3860><s%> to a depraved <S%G96><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which are not proper, <S%G2520><s%>
